title: New: Fitness Club Fiasco – Hades
content: Ontario’s Fitness Club Fiasco sound like they’re ready to play to colossal festival crowds, and this is only their second track. Hades is ambitious, gloriously over-the-top at points, and resoundingly anthemic. Check it out below, and grab a free download over at Bandcamp.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
